title: Convergence Education in Textile Design and Mathematical Spatial Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary geometry and measurement knowledge, general understanding of textile design
context.additional_context: Intensive short-term course for pre-service teachers to understand the connection between textile design and mathematics and develop creative teaching methods applicable in real-world settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply geometric principles required for analyzing textile patterns
Learners can develop textile design activity plans utilizing spatial concepts
Learners can create textile-mathematics integrated lesson materials using mobile learning tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
